title: Educating Ansley
description: "a hot little romp of fun" Miranda, Joyfully Reviewed Connecticut's rich and beautiful summer at mansions in the Hamptons not on a ranch in Colorado, but that's exactly where society girl Ansley Craig's been banished by her grandmother just for having a little too much fun at a party. She expects to find cows and boredom at the Kane ranch. What she doesn't count on are the Kane men. Ansley may have the college degree, but Jeremy and Ryan are two cowboys who can teach her a few things she didn't learn in school.
author: Cat Johnson
